item.title: Futuristic Illustrations by Artist Simon Stålenhag
item.description:
Futuristic Illustrations by Artist Simon Stålenhag

We recently featured Bratislava-based web designer Slavomier's social media warning label mock-ups (click here for previous post). Well New York-based artist Chino Kim takes things a step further with Screeners - basically a pair of glasses that become opaque (effectively blinding the wearer) when in view of a computer, smartphone or television screen.
